description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify potential issues and suggest proactive maintenance actions. This is a normal operational scenario, focusing on the agent's routine tasks and data analysis.
initial_goal: Minimize equipment downtime in the semiconductor fabrication plant by predicting and preventing failures using sensor data and historical maintenance records.
constraints: data_access_restrictions: Only authorized sensor data allowed
latency_limit: Predictions must be delivered within 5 minutes of data acquisition
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a wafer fabrication plant)
